trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Deleting"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gir dataene for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Deleting"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The LinqDataSourceDeleteEventArgs object is passed to any handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Deleting> event.
trans-unit.target: LinqDataSourceDeleteEventArgs-objekt som er sendt til noen behandlingsprogram for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Deleting>hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Deleting>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceDeleteEventArgs.OriginalObject%2A> property contains the data that will be deleted.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceDeleteEventArgs.OriginalObject%2A>inneholder dataene som skal slettes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceDeleteEventArgs.OriginalObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the object that represents the data source throws a validation exception before it deletes the data, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceDeleteEventArgs.Exception%2A> property contains an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceValidationException> class.
trans-unit.target: Hvis objektet som representerer datakilden oppstår et unntak for validering før den slettes data, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceDeleteEventArgs.Exception%2A>inneholder en forekomst av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceValidationException>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceValidationException> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceDeleteEventArgs.Exception%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can retrieve all the validation exceptions through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceValidationException.InnerExceptions%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan hente alle validering unntak via den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceValidationException.InnerExceptions%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceValidationException.InnerExceptions%2A>

trans-unit.source: If no validation exception is thrown, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceDeleteEventArgs.Exception%2A> property contains `null`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ingen validering unntak, den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceDeleteEventArgs.Exception%2A>egenskapen inneholder `null`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceDeleteEventArgs.Exception%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you handle the validation exceptions and do not want the exception to be re-thrown, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceDeleteEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du behandle validering unntakene og vil ikke unntaket bli utløst på nytt, angir du <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceDeleteEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceDeleteEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>

trans-unit.source: You create an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Deleting> event to validate the data, to examine validation errors from the data class, or to cancel the delete operation.
trans-unit.target: Du oppretter en hendelsesbehandling for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Deleting>-hendelsen for å validere dataene, vil undersøke valideringsfeil fra klassen data eller avbryte sletteoperasjonen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Deleting>

trans-unit.source: You cancel the delete operation by setting the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Du avbryter sletteoperasjonen ved å angi den <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> control stores the original values from the data source in view state in the Web page, except those whose <xref:System.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute> attribute is marked as `UpdateCheck.Never`.
trans-unit.target: Som standard i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>kontrollen butikker opprinnelige verdier fra datakilden i visningen tilstand på siden, bortsett fra de som har egenskapen <xref:System.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute>attributtet er merket som `UpdateCheck.Never`.</xref:System.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>

trans-unit.source: LINQ to SQL automatically checks the integrity of the data before deleting the data.
trans-unit.target: LINQ til SQL kontrollerer automatisk integriteten til dataene før du sletter dataene.

trans-unit.source: It does this by comparing the current values in the data source with the original values that are stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: Den gjør dette ved å sammenligne de gjeldende verdiene i datakilden med de opprinnelige verdiene som lagres i visningsstatusen.

trans-unit.source: You can perform additional data validation by creating a handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Deleting> event.
trans-unit.target: Du kan utføre flere datavalidering ved å opprette et behandlingsprogram for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Deleting>hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Deleting>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceDeleteEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceDeleteEventArgs"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: An object of the type specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.TableName*> property that contains the data to delete.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt av typen som er angitt i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.TableName*>-egenskap som inneholder dataene du vil slette.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.TableName*>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceDeleteEventArgs"></xref> class with the specified exception.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceDeleteEventArgs"> </xref> klassen med det angitte unntaket.

trans-unit.source: The exception that occurred when validating the data to delete.
trans-unit.target: Unntaket oppstod under validering av dataene for å slette.

trans-unit.source: Gets the exception that was thrown while the data was being validated before the delete operation.
trans-unit.target: Henter unntak oppstod mens dataene ble valideres før sletteoperasjonen.

trans-unit.source: If a validation exception is thrown before the delete operation is performed, the exception is stored in the Exception property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en validering unntak før sletteoperasjonen utføres, lagret unntaket i egenskapen unntak.

trans-unit.source: In an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Deleting> event, you can retrieve the exception through the Exception property.
trans-unit.target: I en hendelsesbehandling for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Deleting>hendelse, kan du hente unntaket via egenskapen unntak.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Deleting>

trans-unit.source: The exception, if an error occurred; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Unntaket, hvis det oppstod en feilen; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the exception was handled and that it should not be thrown again.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om unntaket ble håndtert, og at den ikke må være et nytt.

trans-unit.source: You can create an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Deleting> event to examine validation exceptions that were thrown before the delete operation.
trans-unit.target: Du kan opprette en hendelsesbehandling for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Deleting>-hendelsen for å undersøke validering unntak som er et før sletteoperasjonen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Deleting>

trans-unit.source: If you handle the exception and do not want it to be thrown again, set the ExceptionHandled property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du unntaket og ikke vil bli utløst på nytt, angi ExceptionHandled egenskapen `true`.

trans-unit.source: If you do not set the ExceptionHandled property to `true`, the exception will be propagated to the next event handler in the call stack.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du ikke angi egenskapen ExceptionHandled `true`, unntaket vil bli overført til neste hendelsesbehandlingen i kallstakken.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the exception was handled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis unntaket ble håndtert; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the object that represents the data to delete.
trans-unit.target: Henter objektet som representerer dataene du vil slette.

trans-unit.source: You can use the OriginalObject property to interact with the data before it is deleted.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke egenskapen OriginalObject kan samhandle med dataene før den er slettet.

trans-unit.source: You can validate the data, or you can cancel the event by setting the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Du kan validere dataene, eller du kan avbryte hendelsen ved å angi den <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can modify which record is deleted by changing the value or values of the object in the OriginalObject property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan endre posten slettes ved å endre verdien eller verdiene for objektet i egenskapen OriginalObject.

trans-unit.source: An object of the type specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.TableName*> property that contains the data to delete.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt av typen som er angitt i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.TableName*>-egenskap som inneholder dataene du vil slette.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.TableName*>
